name: Coronite
description: Have you ever dreamed of seeing what's going on in your body ?  In Coronite, you are a virus competing with others. Inspired by battle royale games, followers of this genre, this game is for you. You will live an experience rich in emotions ! Come and defeat other viruses in order to acquire cryptocurrency. This will allow you to differentiate yourself from the mass by changing your appearance with the help of epic skins.
